text: Hi!  I hope you are having a nice Holiday
Yes and I hope yours is good also
I have a grown daughter and two precious grandchildren.  And you?
WE just have a cat named Sissy. She's our child. LOL
WE have a dog named Bailey.  So including my husband I really have three children
LOL, yeah they are like children. Bot pets and husbands.
Have you heard of the program Save the  Children?
Yes, I saw an ad on TV recently about it.
It is a highly rated (88% out of 100%) program that provides health, education and emotional support for children around the world
That's a lofty goal.

I agree, sometimes we have to break it down. .  You know, I am particularly interested in the children in Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria.  They recently increased the death toll to over 3000.  But there is no breakdown for children
Yes, they suffered greatly. there. But I'm more interested in what can be done for children in the US especially in the inner cities and Appalachia.

Save the Children wrote and article called :The Urban Disadvantage.  It details what the call "The Survival of the Richest."  Save the Children has hundreds of low income clinics in cities are over American, and hundreds of outside educational programs to help urban children keep up.
Oh that's really good to know. I thought they dealt mainly with ioverseas projects.
In the US, 1 out of 5 children are living in poverty.  Can you believe that, here in the US?  Save the Children was founded in 1932, and has provided services ever since.
(Forgive my spelling mistakes! I need to proof before hitting send) I do believe that about the US. I used to work with inner city kids and know the horrors they live with here in the US.

The requester, Richard Kim has a 4/5 point rating.  He says the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children. "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2)
You told me stuff I did not know about Save the Children. Because of that I'll donate half ($1.00). Good job!
Thank you.  I appreciate your generosity.
Hey, I'm also the one that the cub and girl scouts mark my house cause I'm an easy touch esp where kids are concerned.
